fullDescription.intro:
Finds features in Uniprot entries.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: Column containing the Uniprot accession number
position in the peptidic sequence (first amino acid has index=1)

ports.inPort: A table containing a Uniprot accession and a position in the protein
ports.outPort: appends the annotation found in Uniprot
